Uses of Class
tiled.mapeditor.actions.AbstractLayerAction

Packages that use AbstractLayerAction
tiled.mapeditor.actions   
 

Uses of AbstractLayerAction in tiled.mapeditor.actions
 

Subclasses of AbstractLayerAction in tiled.mapeditor.actions
 class AddLayerAction
          Adds a layer to the current map and selects it.
 class AddObjectGroupAction
          Adds a object group layer to the current map and selects it.
 class CloneLayerAction
          Clones the current layer, adds the clone to the map at the top of the layer stack and then selects it.
 class DeleteLayerAction
          Deletes the selected layer and selects the layer that takes the same index.
 class MergeAllLayersAction
          Merges all layers of the map.
 class MergeLayerDownAction
          Merges the current layer with the one below and selects the merged layer.
 class MoveLayerDownAction
          Swaps the currently selected layer with the layer below.
 class MoveLayerUpAction
          Swaps the currently selected layer with the layer above.
